meta.name: AI-Powered Web Form Responder with GPT-4o-mini, Outlook Email & Twilio SMS

options.systemMessage:
You are an AI assistant helping Robert respond to web form submissions. Each submission includes a name and a question from the user. Your job is to generate:

A professional email response from Robert, and

A short SMS/text message to be sent as a follow-up.

The email should:

Greet the person by name.

Reference the submitted question.

Ask at least one clarifying or engaging question.

Let them know Robert will be in contact very soon.

Ask how urgent the request is so it can be prioritized.

Be signed ‚ÄúRobert‚Äù.

The text message should:

Be casual and friendly.

Confirm that the message was received.

Mention that I will follow up shortly.

Ask how urgent the request is.

Output format: 

{
	"email": "response",
	"text": "response"
}

nodes.name: Form to be embedded on website
Wait some time to write the email response
Wait some time to write the text response

parameters.subject: Web form - How can we help?

parameters.content:
### Web-Form Auto-Responder: Instant Email + SMS Follow-Up
**LinkedIn:** https://www.linkedin.com/in/robertbreen
**Email:** rbreen@ynteractive.com

### Web-Form Auto-Responder: Instant Email + SMS Follow-Up

---

#### üìù Description
Embed a simple web form on your site and let this workflow:

1. **Collect** a visitor‚Äôs **name, email, phone, and question**  
2. **Generate** a professional email *and* a friendly SMS using **GPT-4o-mini**  
3. **Delay** briefly (1 min by default) to simulate human writing time  
4. **Send** the AI-crafted email via Microsoft Outlook  
5. **Send** the AI-crafted text via Twilio  

Perfect for solo consultants or small teams who want rapid, personalized responses without manual typing.

---

#### ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions

1. **Import the workflow**  
   - n8n ‚Üí **Workflows ‚Üí Import from File** (or **Paste JSON**) ‚Üí **Save**

2. **Add credentials**  
   | Service | Where to get credentials | Node(s) to update |
   |---------|-------------------------|-------------------|
   | **OpenAI** | <https://platform.openai.com> ‚Üí create API key | **OpenAI Chat Model** |
   | **Microsoft Outlook** | Azure/M365 account with email-send permissions | **Send email to the submitter** |
   | **Twilio** | <https://console.twilio.com> ‚Üí Account SID, Auth Token | **Send text to the submitter** |

3. **Embed the form on your website**  
   - Open **Form to be embedded on website**  
   - Click **‚ÄúEmbed‚Äù** ‚Üí copy the iframe code ‚Üí paste into your contact page

4. **Set your Twilio ‚ÄúFrom‚Äù number**  
   - In **Send text to the submitter**, change the from phone number to your verified Twilio number

5. **Adjust wait times (optional)**  
   - *Wait some time to write the email response* (default 1 min)  
   - *Wait some time to write the text response* (default 1 min)

6. **Customize the AI prompt (optional)**  
   - Edit the **AI Agent** system message to tweak tone, questions asked, or signature

7. **Test the flow**  
   - Open the form URL (generated by the Form node)  
   - Submit a test entry ‚Üí after ~1 min you should receive both an email and an SMS

8. **Activate**  
   - Toggle **Active** so the form handles real submissions 24/7

---

#### üß© Customization Ideas
- Pipe form data into **Pipedrive, HubSpot, or Airtable** for lead tracking  
- Trigger a **Slack/Teams** alert to notify your team of hot questions  
- Add a **calendar link** in the email so visitors can book a call instantly  
- Use a **language-detection node** to reply in the visitor‚Äôs native language

---

### Contact
- **Email:** rbreen@ynteractive.com  
- **Website:** https://ynteractive.com  
- **YouTube:** https://www.youtube.com/@ynteractivetraining  
- **LinkedIn:** https://www.linkedin.com/in/robertbreen
